card_text: 2 "Dream Mirror" monsters with different Attributes$NWhile face-up on the field, this card is also DARK-Attribute. You can only use each of the following effects of "Oneiros, the Dream Mirror Erlking" once per turn.$N●If another monster you control is Tributed (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.$N●If this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Dream Mirror" monster from your GY, except "Oneiros, the Dream Mirror Erlking".
